Verses: 1 pariseyarum Sadhuseyarum Avarai Sodhikkumpadi Avaridaththil Vandhu: Vaanaththilirundhu Or Adaiyaalaththaith Thangalukkuk Kaanpikkavendum Endru Kettaargal.
2 avargalukku Avar Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Asdhamanamaagirapodhu, Sevvaanamittirukkiradhu, Adhinaal Velivaangum Endru Sollugireergal.

3 udhayamaagirapodhu Sevvaanamum Mandhaaramumaayirukkiradhu, Adhinaal Indraikkuk Kaatrum Mazhaiyum Untaagum Endru Sollugireergal. Maayakkaarare, Vaanaththin Thotraththai Nidhaanikka Ungalukkuth Theriyume, Kaalangalin Adaiyaalangalai Nidhaanikka Ungalaal Koodaadhaa?

4 indhap Pollaadha Vibachaara Sandhadhiyaar Adaiyaalam Thedugiraargal; Yonaa Theerkkadharisiyin Adaiyaalameyandri Vere Adaiyaalam Ivargalukkuk Kodukkappaduvadhillai Endru Solli, Avargalaivittup Purappattupponaar.
5 avarudaiya Seeshargal Akkarai Serndhapodhu Appangalaik Konduvara Marandhuponaargal.
6 yesu Avargalai Nokki: Pariseyar Sadhuseyar Enbavargalin Puliththamaavaikkuriththu Echcharikkaiyaayirungal Endraar.
7 naam Appangalaik Konduvaraadhapadiyaal Ippadi Sollugiraar Endru Avargal Thangalukkulle Yosanaipannikkondaargal.
8 yesu Adhai Arindhu: Arpavisuvaasigale, Appangalaik Konduvaraadhaikkuriththu Neengal Ungalukkulle Yosanaipannukiradhenna?
9 innum Neengal Unaravillaiyaa? Aindhu Appangalai Aiyaayiram Perukkup Pagirndhadhaiyum, Meedhiyaanadhai Eththanai Koodai Niraiya Eduththeergal Enpadhaiyum;
10 ezhu Appangalai Naalaayiram Perukkup Pagirndhadhaiyum, Meedhiyaanadhai Eththanai Koodai Niraiya Eduththeergal Enpadhaiyum Neengal Ninaivukooraamalirukkireergalaa?
11 pariseyar Sadhuseyar Enbavargalin Puliththamaavaikkuriththu Echcharikkaiyaayirukkavendum Endru Naan Sonnadhu Appaththaikkuriththu Sollavillai Endru Neengal Unaraadhirukkiradhu Eppadi Endraar.

12 appozhudhu, Avar Appaththin Puliththamaavaikkuriththu Echcharikkaiyaayirukkavendum Endru Sollaamal, Pariseyar Sadhuseyar Enpavargalin Upadhesaththaikkuriththe Appadi Sonnaar Endru Arindhukondaargal.
13 pinbu, Yesu Pilippu Sesariyaavin Thisaigalil Vandhapodhu, Thammudaiya Seesharai Nokki: Manushakumaaranaagiya Ennai Janangal Yaar Endru Sollugiraargal Endru Kettaar.
14 adharku Avargal: Silar Ummai Yovaan Snaanan Endrum, Silar Eliyaa Endrum, Veru Silar Eremiyaa, Alladhu Theerkkadharisigalil Oruvar Endrum Sollugiraargal Endraargal.
15 appozhudhu Avar: Neengal Ennai Yaarendru Sollugireergal Endru Kettaar.
16 seemon Pedhuru Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Neer Jeevanulla Dhevanudaiya Kumaaranaagiya Kiristhu Endraan.
17 yesu Avanai Nokki: Yonaavin Kumaaranaagiya Seemone, Nee Paakkiyavaan; Maamsamum Raththamum Idhai Unakku Velippaduththavillai, Paralogaththilirukkira En Pidhaa Idhai Unakku Velippaduththinaar.
18 melum Naan Unakku Sollugiren, Nee Pedhuruvaayirukkiraai, Indhakkallin Mel En Sabaiyaikkattuven; Paadhaalaththin Vaasalgal Adhai Merkolvadhillai.

19 paralogaraajyaththin Thiravukolgalai Naan Unakkuth Tharuven; Poologaththile Nee Kattugiradhu Edhuvo Adhu Paralogaththilum Kattappattirukkum, Poologaththile Nee Kattavizhppadhu Edhuvo Adhu Paralogaththilum Kattavizhkkappattirukkum Endraar.
20 appozhudhu, Thaam Kiristhuvaagiya Yesu Endru Oruvarukkum Sollaadhapadikkuth Thammudaiya Seeshargalukkuk Kattalaiyittaar.

21 adhumudhal Yesu, Thaam Erusalemukkuppoi, Moopparaalum Piradhaana Aasaariyaraalum Vedhapaaragaraalum Pala Paadugal Pattu, Kolaiyundu, Moondraam Naalil Ezhundhirukkavendum Enpadhaith Thammudaiya Seeshargalukku Sollaththodanginaar.
22 appozhudhu, Pedhuru Avaraith Thaniye Azhaiththukkondupoi: Aandavare, Idhu Umakku Neridakkoodaadhe, Idhu Umakku Sampavippadhillai Endru Avaraik Kadindhukollath Thodanginaan.
23 avaro Thirumbip Pedhuruvaippaarththu: Enakkup Pinnaagappo, Saaththaane, Nee Enakku Idaralaayirukkiraai; Dhevanukketravaigalai Sindhiyaamal Manusharukku Etravaikalai Sindhikkiraai Endraar.
24 appozhudhu, Yesu Thammudaiya Seeshargalai Nokki: Oruvan Ennaip Pinpatri Vara Virumbinaal, Avan Thannaiththaan Veruththu, Than Siluvaiyai Eduththukkondu Ennaip Pinpatrakkadavan
25 than Jeevanai Ratchikka Virumbugiravan Adhai Izhandhupovaan; Ennimiththamaagath Than Jeevanai Izhandhu Pogiravan Adhaik Kandadaivaan.
26 manushan Ulagam Muzhuvadhaiyum Aadhaayappaduththikkondaalum, Than Jeevanai Nashtappaduththinaal Avanukku Laabam Enna? Manushan Than Jeevanukku Eedaaga Ennaththaik Koduppaan?
27 manushakumaaran Thammudaiya Pidhaavin Magimaiporundhinavaraaith Thammudaiya Thoodharodungooda Varuvaar; Appozhudhu, Avanavan Kiriyaikkuththakkadhaaga Avanavanukkup Palanalippaar.
28 inge Nirkiravargalil Silar Manushakumaaran Thammudaiya Raajyaththil Varuvadhaik Kaanumun, Maranaththai Rusipaarppadhillai Endru, Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollugiren Endraar.
